application_practice.syntax_hint: Hints: first time here, been to a Japanese salon, usually go
application_practice.sample_answer:
Staff: Is this your first time here?
Customer: Yes, it is.
Staff: Have you been to a Japanese salon before?
Customer: No, this is my first time at a Japanese salon.

application_practice.syntax_hint: Where do you usually go? / How was it different? / Better or worse?
application_practice.sample_answer:
Staff: Where do you usually go for haircuts?
Customer: I go to a salon near my house.
Staff: I see. Have you been to a Japanese salon before?
Customer: Yes, once in Tokyo.
Staff: How was it different?
Customer: It was much more detailed and careful.

application_practice.syntax_hint: Japanese salons are... / We take our time / Very detailed / Careful
application_practice.sample_answer:
Customer: This is my first time at a Japanese salon.
Staff: Welcome! Japanese salons are very detailed. We take our time to make sure everything is perfect.
Customer: That sounds great!
Staff: Yes, we are very careful with every step.
